text: I need to construct a global footer that looks like this, I'm very new at HubSpot and was wondering what would be the best approach. This needs to be easily editable for Marketers to update. Please advise, thank you!
I would use a <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/global-content|global partial> and some menu modules for the menus.  Follow me module for the social icons.
